body_html:
Thanks @junshi15 for the feedback.
For the first issue I thought about maybe having some kind of a tensor buffers pools (max size), and maybe use it for the above cases, but you're about the second issue (ordering) and overall this is a not a good plan.

Your idea sounds good and maybe we could progress with it.
Let me try to do a quick check and get back to you.

body:
Thanks @junshi15 for the feedback.
For the first issue I thought about maybe having some kind of a tensor buffers pools (max size), and maybe use it for the above cases, but you're about the second issue (ordering) and overall this is a not a good plan.

Your idea sounds good and maybe we could progress with it.
Let me try to do a quick check and get back to you.
